title: Cyber Forensics and Attribution
description: Following a network breach, a cyber forensics analyst must analyze the attacker's malware to determine its capabilities and origin.

tasks.description: Safely extract the malware sample from the compromised system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully obtains the malware in a secure, isolated environment.

tasks.description: Perform static and dynamic analysis of the malware to identify its functions (e.g., keylogging, data exfiltration).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies all of the malware's capabilities.

tasks.description: Compare the malware's code and behavior to a database of known threat actors to make a preliminary attribution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst finds a match and attributes the attack to a known nation-state adversary.
